alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wheeler and southeastern Hemphill Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Briscoe, or 20 miles east of Miami, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Briscoe and Allison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
